decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats, and manipulating the game with card draw and manipulation effects. The deck aims to stall the game until it can win through alternate win conditions like Approach of the Second Sun. Elminster serves as the commander to provide additional card advantage and utility. The deck includes a variety of counterspells, removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Supreme Verdict, and card draw spells like Brainstorm and Serum Visions. It also includes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria to further dominate the game. The deck is designed to control the tempo of the game and outvalue opponents in a 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing counterspells, removal, and card advantage to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Glarb, Calamity's Augur serves as the commander to provide additional card advantage and control options. The deck includes a wide range of control elements such as counterspells like Counterspell and Force of Will, removal spells like Toxic Deluge and Fatal Push, and card draw spells like Brainstorm and Mystic Confluence. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Oko, Thief of Crowns to provide additional card advantage and threats. Additionally, the deck includes a variety of versatile creatures and mana ramp to support its control strategy.

This deck focuses on control and disruption, utilizing a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to control the pace of the game. The commanders, Wernog and Cecily, provide a strong control aspect with their abilities. The deck includes powerful cards like Force of Will, Teferi, Time Raveler, and Supreme Verdict to maintain board presence and disrupt opponents' strategies. The mana base is well-balanced with a variety of dual lands and fetch lands to ensure consistent mana production. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage, while leveraging the commanders' abilities to maintain control and outmaneuver opponents.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through countering opponent's spells, drawing cards, and managing the battlefield using powerful control spells and creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while gradually building up its own resources and advantage. Cards like Force of Will, Cryptic Command, and Jace, the Mind Sculptor provide strong control options, while creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Murktide Regent offer threats that are difficult for opponents to deal with. The deck also includes versatile spells like Brainstorm and Preordain for card selection, and efficient counterspells like Mana Leak and Spell Pierce to protect its own game plan. Ultimately, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and control the game until victory is achieved.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creatures and spells that deal direct damage and disrupt their strategy. By utilizing cards like Gut, True Soul Zealot and Agent of the Shadow Thieves as commanders, along with a combination of high-impact creatures like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Mayhem Devil, the deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes a versatile array of removal spells like Dreadbore and Terminate to deal with opposing threats. The mana base is carefully crafted to support a balanced mix of colors and provide efficient access to the deck's powerful spells, ensuring a consistent and aggressive gameplay.

This aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while efficiently removing threats from the board. It utilizes a combination of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, as well as removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Dark Confidant and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to pressure the opponent and generate value. Additionally, the deck features cards like Sorin of House Markov and Virtue of Persistence to grant lifelink and resilience. With a mix of disruption, removal, and threats, this deck aims to control the game and close it out quickly with aggressive plays.
